ISSUE.TITLE: Facebook Pixel. Notify a customer that the "custom events" panel is displayed only after the first saving
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: nopCommerce version: 4.30 Steps to reproduce the problem: 1. Go the the Facebook Pixel plugin configuration page 1. Click "Add configuration" 1. You will be redirected to the page which says you can configure custom events below but there is no any custom events panel 1. Save this configuration. You will be redirected to the configuration list page (there is even no save and continue button) 1. To eventually add the custom events you need to find your last configuration in the list, go to its page, and see the newly added custom events panel It is really not user-friendly
